My colleague @RepBradWenstrup and I introduced H.R.2550, the Prevent BLEEDing Act, which will expand access to medical equipment designed to prevent traumatic blood loss and save lives during emergency situations.

National Stop the Bleed Day is a day to raise awareness of how to respond to severe bleeding incidents. Learning how to respond to a traumatic bleeding incident can be the difference between life and death while waiting for professional help to arrive. https://bit.ly/2QiHYcd

I’m proud to be a cosponsor of @RepJudyChu @RepMarciaFudge & @RepLoisFrankel’s #ActForWomen because it is unconstitutional & immoral to restrict basic health care like abortion. We must fight to ensure women’s reproductive freedom, health, dignity, & equality across our country.
